The Kieslect KS 2 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch, a cutting-edge wearable designed to enhance your daily life. Crafted from durable plastic, this smartwatch ensures longevity while maintaining a remarkably lightweight build, making it comfortable to wear throughout the day. With two intuitive navigation buttons and a versatile strap available in both magnetic and silicone options, the KS 2 offers a seamless user experience. The 22mm strap complements your wrist comfortably, and the watch's 3ATM water-resistance grade adds durability, allowing you to wear it in various conditions without worry. The sleek and timeless black finish of the KS 2 smartwatch complements any style. This smartwatch is its high-quality FHD AMOLED Super Dynamic screen. The Kieslect KS 2 is powered by a robust 300mAh battery, providing an impressive 3-4 days of battery life for regular daily use, and up to 10 days in standby mode. Quick charging takes as little as 2.5 hours, ensuring you spend more time using your smartwatch and less time waiting for it to charge. The package includes a convenient charging cable for added convenience. Equipped with essential sensors, the KS 2 offers features like Sleep Quality monitoring, 24-hour Heart Rate monitoring, and SpO2 monitoring, helping you keep track of your health and well-being. The smartwatch seamlessly connects to your devices via Bluetooth v5.3, ensuring a stable and efficient connection. Stay connected, monitor your health, and enjoy the modern design and impressive features of the Kieslect KS 2 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch, a valuable addition to your everyday life.

Kieslect K10 Smart Watch

The Kieslect K10 Smart Watch features a 4-Layer suspended screen design that allows edges while every edge shines. It is a premium watch with an awesome and killer design. It comes with a 1.32" Semi-AMOLED Retina Display with an HD resolution of 360x360 pixels. The Kieslect K10 offers in-depth sleep monitoring, which can more accurately determine the sleep stage (the light sleep, deep sleep), monitors the sleep breathing condition, and provides quality analysis and suggestions for improvement based on a night of sleep. It is equipped with an advanced biological tracking optical sensor in the watch that can perform 24-hour heart rate monitoring It covers heart rate zones, keeping you aware of the exercise effect, and provides warnings when your resting heart rate is abnormally elevated. It also features smart 24-hour monitoring of blood-oxygen levels. The Kieslect K10 is IP68 waterproof. So you don't have to worry about the watch. The Kieslect K10 comes with 13 built-in sports modes. Activate one of the sports modes that you need and, after the exercise is over, the watch will produce a corresponding analytical report which is also viewable in the mobile app. Smart sports include: Running, walking, cycling climbing, spinning, yoga, rope skipping, gymnastics, badminton, table tennis, rowing, sit-ups, free(define), tracking your progress, and setting goals specific to you. The Kieslect K10 comes with a 01-year warranty.

full_description:
Kieslect L11 Lady Smart Watch

The Kieslect L11 is an excellent Smart Watch. This particular smartwatch model is specially made for women's usage. This is why this watch comes with some women-centric features. This Round dialed smartwatch is specifically designed for women only. This watch has a Borderless design That uses exquisitely crafted curved glass. but apart from that, This watch supports a variety of features and customizable options. The Aluminum made dial is Pink colored. The Display is a borderless IPS panel 1.09 Inch screen that supports the screen resolution of 240 x 240 pixels. This smartwatch is compatible with Android and IOS Operating systems. This watch comes with various sensors like the Heart-rate, Proximity, and Accelerometer sensor. This smartwatch supports Bluetooth Version 5.0 as a form of connectivity. But it does not have Bluetooth calling, NFC, or GPS. but this watch has 9 Multi-sports modes with a real-time Heart rate monitor, Blood Oxygen Monitor, Sleep monitor, cycle monitor, and more. This watch is IP68 Waterproof. The supported apps include Sedentary reminders, Sleep monitors, Alarms, Barometer, Brightness Adjusting, etc. The Battery Capacity is180 mAh. with a Normal Usage of around 2-3 days. This smartwatch utilizes an App named GloryFit. This app is compatible with both Android and iOS. This watch has interchangeable Straps made with Silicone. with the basic watch mode. The 180 mAh Battery can last up to 4 days on a single charge. The dimensions of this smartwatch are 46.3 x 40.5 x 11.4 mm. This watch weighs around 22.0 g. Kieslect L11 Lady Smart Watch offers a 01-year warranty.

The Aluminum made dial is Pink colored. The Display is a borderless IPS panel 1.3 Inch AMOLED screen that supports the screen resolution of 240 x 240 pixels. This smartwatch is compatible with Android and IOS Operating systems. This watch comes with various sensors like the Heart-rate, Proximity, and Accelerometer sensor. This smartwatch supports Bluetooth Version 5.0 as a form of connectivity. It comes with a real-time Heart rate monitor, Blood Oxygen Monitor, Sleep monitor, cycle monitor, and more. This watch is IP68 Waterproof. The supported apps include Music, Body Energy Monitoring, Animated Workouts, Female Menstrual Reminder, Sleep Tracking, Calories, Water Drink Reminder, 24/7 Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen, IP68 Waterproof, Stopwatch, Pedometer, Call & Message Notification, etc. The Battery Capacity is180 mAh. with a Normal Usage of around 2-3 days. This smartwatch utilizes an App named GloryFit. This app is compatible with both Android and iOS. This watch has interchangeable Straps made with Silicone. with the basic watch mode. The 180 mAh Battery can last up to 4 days on a single charge. The Kieslect L11 Pro offers a 01-year warranty.

full_description:
Kieslect KR Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch Orchid Pink

The Kieslect KR Calling Smart Watch delivers a strong chip with dual functionalities of Bluetooth data transfer and Bluetooth voice transmission. It is the world's third 2-in-1 Core Calling Chip strong chip, after only Apple and Samsung. Because of the single chip, the power consumption is 30% lower than that of the dual chip, making the Kieslect KR Calling Smart Watch equivalent to the top 10 thin calling watches. It delivers you a quick, reliable, and energy efficient smartwatch calling experience.

Never Miss Any Calls

The Kieslect KR Smart Watch has a waterproof microphone and speaker that allows you to answer calls on the watch when it's inconvenient for you to pick up your mobile phone. Connect the KR Calling Smart Watch to your phone via Bluetooth to ensure you never miss an important call again.

Sharper Display

Kieslect KR's 1.32" SEMI-AMOLED display is larger, clearer, and offers a more vibrant, fluid viewing experience. View all the notifications on the go with the vivid display on your wrist.

Multiple Work-out Modes

KR Calling Smart Watch comes with built-in 70 sports modes, covering daily and professional sports categories including walking, running, cycling, swimming, outdoor, indoor, dancing, fighting, ball games, ice and snow and other 10 sports categories. Provides multiple sports-related data to meet the extensive needs of different sports groups.

Monitoring During Sleep

Kieslect KR Smart Watch monitors your sleep 24-hour and provides detailed reports on deep sleep and light sleep to help you find out what is going on during your sleep.

Blood Oxygen Measurement & Stress Monitoring

This Smart Watch calculates blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) level which indicates the amount of oxygen in the blood. Get an SpO2 measurement at anytime and anywhere for a peace of mind. It supports continuous SpO2 tracking during sleep. Also, continuous stress monitoring helps you achieve a better work-life balance.

Continuous Heart Rate Movement Tracking

Kieslect KR has built-in high-precision PPG sensor will track your heart rate 24 hours a day and sends alert when abnormal heart rate is detected.

Features & Functions

The Kieslect KR Calling Smart Watch can proficiently handle your personal agendas, notify you of incoming calls or messages, and provide movement reminders when you have been sitting for too long. The watch will also track your events, and offers Do Not Disturb mode, stopwatch, sedentary reminder, find mobile phone, flashlight, exercise record and weather forecast functions, as well as enabling the setting of alarms and timers.

Delicate Navigation Crown
